title: Page Content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has turned accessibility on
AND the user has installed Head to Head Challenge
AND the user is not logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects items on sign in page
custom_expected: THEN the user will hear each item read properly

title: Signing In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has turned accessibility 
AND the user has installed Head to Head Challenge
AND the user is not logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects items on sign in page
custom_expected: THEN the user will hear each item read properly

custom_preconds:

custom_expected: Then content will be read properly

title: Launcher Icon
custom_preconds:
Given we have turned the devices Accessibility settings on
And we are currently not inside of the application
custom_steps: When we tap on the Head to Head launcher icon
custom_expected: Then the launcher icon will be successfully read

title: Advertisement
custom_preconds:
Given we have turned the devices Accessibility settings on
And we have an Advertisement available at the bottom of the page
custom_steps: When we tap on the Advertisement
custom_expected: Then it is read as "link"

title: Settings
custom_preconds:
Given we have turned the devices Accessibility settings on
And we have selected the Settings menu item
custom_steps: When we tap on a Setting
custom_expected:
Then the Setting is properly read

REPEAT for each Setting

title: Navigation Buttons
custom_preconds: Given we have turned the devices Accessibility settings on
custom_steps: When we tap on one of the main Navigation Buttons
custom_expected:
Then the Navigation Button is properly read

REPEAT for all navigation buttons
